text: Captain of the Carroburg Greatswords Regiment
Founder and commander of the mercenary company called the Grudgebringers, named after Morgan's magic sword Grudgebringer.
Visit this area to hire Leitdorf's 9th Crossbows
These mercenaries are highly experienced and proficient fighters.

Their regimental patron is Marius Leitdorf, the "Mad" Elector Count of Averland. Like many of Averland's regiments, the 9th Crossbows regularly guard the entrance to Black Fire Pass, route through the Black Mountains.
Emperor’s Hellblaster Volley Gun join your faction!
Visit this area to hire Emperor’s Hellblaster Volley Gun
These mercenaries are highly experienced and proficient fighters.
These multi-barrelled cannons are part of the Emperor's personal army.
Todbringer's Reiksguard Knights join your faction!
Visit this area to hire the Todbringer's Reiksguard Knights
These mercenaries are highly experienced and proficient fighters.
The Reiksguard Order comprises an elite core of well-trained and well-equipped troops loyal to the Emperor who fight on his behalf.
Leader of a regiment of Knights of the Realm
Led by Tristan de la Tour
Leader of a regiment of Grail Knights
Dwarf Envoy from the fortress of Zhufbar.
Dark Omen & Shadow of the Horned Rat
Leader of a regiment of Flagellants
Captain of a Glade Guard Regiment
Captain of a Wood Elf Archers Regiment
Leader of a Ogre Mercenary Band
When drunk, this magic potion increases the strength of the bearer's regiment for a short period of time, allowing them to inflict far more damage on enemy troops in melee
